actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Thompson without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 101.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to authorize donation of Federal law enforcement canines that are no longer needed for official purposes to individuals with experience handling canines in the performance of law enforcement duties.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to authorize Federal agency heads to donate surplus law enforcement canines determined to be no longer needed for official purposes to an individual who has experience handling canines in the performance of law enforcement duties.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to authorize donation of Federal law enforcement canines that are no longer needed for official purposes to individuals with experience handling canines in the performance of law enforcement duties.
